subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Delia Fischer, a FIFA spokeswoman, announced that Luis Suárez, Uruguay’s striker, will be banned for nine matches after being found guilty of biting the Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini.
snippet: Delia Fischer, a FIFA spokeswoman, announced that Luis Suárez, Uruguay’s striker, will be banned for nine matches after being found guilty of biting the Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini.
